flow-definition.description: build br1 or br (br is now edge since 2021.11.05)

hudson.model.BooleanParameterDefinition.name: cleanBeforeBuild
hudson.model.BooleanParameterDefinition.description: to clean workspace before build 1. 'clean' will do checkout 2. non-clean will just build

hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.name: stage
hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.description: br1 or br br1 has target br br has target edge or q8

hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.name: target
hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.description: build target has edge or q8 edge for edge to generate rootfs.tar(.xz) and bzImage q8 for q8client to generate diff.tgz
